WorkItem.Description:
This was originally part of another report and the other issues were fixed and the item closed.  At any rate:
 
Update item cache from armory changes the benefit for many items from providing Bonus Armor to providing Armor (see below).  The attached patch resolves this issue.
 
 
 
[35680] Amulet of Wills
BEFORE: 336 Bonus Armor, 55 Stamina, 36 Strength, 25 Dodge Rating
AFTER: 336 Armor, 55 Stamina, 36 Strength, 25 Dodge Rating

BEFORE: 700 Bonus Armor, 78 Agility, 117 Stamina, 104 Attack Power
AFTER: 700 Armor, 78 Agility, 117 Stamina, 104 Attack Power

AFTER: 406 Armor, 66 Stamina, 42 Strength, 28 Defense Rating

AFTER: 462 Armor, 64 Stamina, 43 Strength, 21 Defense Rating

AFTER: 550 Armor, 3025 Health (15 Sec/3 Min)
